hanzi-su-wiki:
錠

Значения

Дверная задвижка; якорь

Мнемоника

Металлическое 金 стремя, в котором утверждается 定 нога. Означает также дверную задвижку, название закрепляющего лекарства, а также ошибочно — якорь.

Варианты

锭
purpleculture_pinyin:
dìng
(weaving) spindle; ingot; pressed cake of medicine etc; classifier for: gold and silver ingots, ink sticks
(ткацкое) веретено; слиток; жмых лекарств и т.д .; классификатор для: золотых и серебряных слитков, чернильных палочек.
rtega_mnemonic:
錠錠RS
锭锭		spindle, slab, cake, tablet, lock, shackles
  • object used to fix (lock) 定 molten metal 金 into it's form: ingot
  • metal 金 object keeping you right at your place 定
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 锭)
Pictophonetic: 定 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 定 [ dìng ] to decide, to fix, to settle; to order; definite, fixed, sure
heisig_constituent: lock, metal, gold, determine, determined, house, mend
heisig_story: Metal of itself doesn't lock. It needs to be so determined by a locksmith. Now make a concrete image of that.
myStory:
утвержденный под крышей ремонт = определенность

и золото
koohiiStory1: Even if you lock up your GOLD, a DETERMINED thief will get it in the end.
koohiiStory2: The best stories for this kanji tend to have a thief in them, which always makes me confuse them with the kanji for burglar (357). So, let´s try this one: My girlfriend wears a metal chastity belt with a lock but I am determined to open it! I must get inside!
jp_example_words: 手錠(てじょう): handcuffs, manacles
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: This is a gold roof, correct? It's important to lock it up, then.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: It's only natural that you'd want to lock a gold roof so nobody can steal it.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The person who locked the gold roof was Jourm (じょう).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: He's the big farmhand who turned out to be an undercover Viking in your town, only to pillage and destroy everything. Under the gold roof is where he locked up all your village's valuables, after wiping you all out.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 綻 (ほころびる、タン прореха, раскрытие по швам).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the gold (金) is determined (定) to be a lock

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 定 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 定 [ dìng ] to decide, to fix, to settle; to order; definite, fixed, sure
①紡車或紡紗機上繞紗的機件：錠子。紗錠。
②金屬或藥物等製成的塊狀物：金錠。銀錠。鋼錠。
③量詞，用於金銀錠及墨：一錠金。
④古代蒸食物的有足的器具。

錠字的基本解释

錠
dìng
见“锭”。

錠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dìng］
［《廣韻》丁定切，去徑，端。］
［《廣韻》徒徑切，去徑，定。］
“锭1”的繁体字。
(1)进熟食的有足蒸器。
(2)膏灯。
(3)锡类金属。
(4)旧时用作货币的银块。
(5)纸币票面金额。
(6)锭状物。
(7)量词。用于成锭状的东西。
(8)用同“釘”。

錠字的康熙字典解释

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dìng］
["Guang Yun" Ding Ding cut, go to the path, end. ]
["Guangyun" cut through the path, go to the path, set. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "Ingot 1".
(1) There are enough steamers for cooked food.
(2) Paste lamp.
(3) Tin type metals.
(4) Silver bullion used as currency in the past.
(5) The face amount of banknotes.
(6) Ingots.
(7) Quantifiers. Used for ingot-shaped things.
(8) Use the same "nail".
